events.message: I am filing a claim concerning a car accident that occurred last night when another vehicle rear-ended me at a stoplight.
The claim has been categorised under 'Auto Accident' based on the details mentioning vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim and will be reaching out shortly to gather further details.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the car collision and we are committed to assisting you through the process.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and your driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents, including photos and the official police report, have been submitted successfully for review.
The investigation process into the car accident has officially started, focusing on determining fault and damages.
The investigation regarding your auto accident claim is complete with findings supporting partial fault of the other driver.
A settlement proposal has been made to cover the repair costs of your vehicle and related expenses resulting from the collision.
The customer has expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciates the prompt handling of the claim.
Your claim has been approved based on the investigation results and settlement terms discussed previously.
Payment for the damages sustained in the auto accident has been issued to your account as per agreement.
The claim related to your vehicle accident has now been closed following successful processing and payment issuance.
All documents and communications regarding your auto accident claim have been archived in our system for future reference.
